trans-unit.source: Provides a strongly typed collection for <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> objects and implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> interface to support navigating through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma coleção fortemente tipada de <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"> </xref> objetos e implementa o <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"> </xref> interface para suporte à navegação por meio da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The SiteMapNodeCollection class provides a strongly typed collection for <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: A classe SiteMapNodeCollection fornece uma coleção fortemente tipada de <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>objetos.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: It stores <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects internally in a zero-based array.
trans-unit.target: Ele armazena <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>objetos internamente em uma matriz com base em zero.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: You can modify a SiteMapNodeCollection collection when it is first created, and then use the following methods to add, copy, and remove <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects: - To add <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Você pode modificar uma coleção de SiteMapNodeCollection quando ele é criado e, em seguida, use os seguintes métodos para adicionar, copiar e remover <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>objetos: - adicionar <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>objetos, use o <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: - To copy <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Para copiar <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>objetos, use o <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: - To remove <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Para remover <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>objetos, use o <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: You can create a read-only SiteMapNodeCollection, which does not permit adding, copying, nor removing <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, by using the static <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.ReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você pode criar um SiteMapNodeCollection somente leitura, que não permite adicionar, copiar, nem remover <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>objetos usando estático <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.ReadOnly%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: The SiteMapNodeCollection collections that are returned by the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetAllNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.GetChildren%2A> methods are read-only, as is the SiteMapNodeCollection that is returned when the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A> property is accessed on a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object that is returned from a provider.
trans-unit.target: As coleções de SiteMapNodeCollection que são retornadas pelo <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetAllNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.GetChildren%2A>métodos são somente para leitura, como é o SiteMapNodeCollection que é retornado quando o <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A>propriedade é acessada em uma <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>objeto que é retornado de um provedor de.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.GetChildren%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetAllNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown, if you attempt to modify a read-only SiteMapNodeCollection by setting the default indexer property or by using any of the following methods: - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Clear%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> Use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> property to check the collection before calling any of the methods in the preceding list.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.NotSupportedException>exceção for lançada, se você tentar modificar uma SiteMapNodeCollection somente leitura, definindo a propriedade do indexador padrão ou usando qualquer um dos métodos a seguir:- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A>- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Clear%2A>- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A>- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A>- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A>uso o <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A>propriedade para verificar a coleção antes de chamar qualquer um dos métodos na lista anterior.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: The array that is passed to the AddRange method can contain `null` values; however, this leads to unexpected exceptions when the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection is manipulated.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire collection to a compatible one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia toda a coleção para uma matriz unidimensional compatível, iniciando no índice especificado da matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method delegates to the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.List%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which accounts for the possible exceptions that are listed in "Exceptions."
trans-unit.target: Os delegados do método CopyTo à <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.List%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, que contas para as possíveis exceções que são listadas em "Exceções."</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.List%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that must have zero-based indexing and is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A matriz unidimensional que deve ter indexação com base em zero e é o destino dos elementos copiados a partir de <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no `array` no qual a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexé menor que zero.

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: arrayé multidimensional.

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of objects in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of array.
trans-unit.target: - ou - o número de objetos na fonte de é maior que o espaço disponível do index ao final da array.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de elementos contidos na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Enumerar através de um <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento de segurança do thread.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: Even when a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> is synchronized, other threads can still modify the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo quando um <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>é sincronizada, outros threads ainda podem modificar a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>, que faz com que o enumerador lançar uma exceção.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes that are made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir a segurança de thread durante a enumeração, você pode o bloqueio de <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>durante toda a enumeração ou capture as exceções resultante de alterações feitas por outros threads de.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>

trans-unit.target: O com base em zero `index` no qual inserir `value`.

trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser inserido em <xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList>
